des: "Frosting for General Robert E. Lee Cake or use your own white or lemon cake recipes.  Enough to cover the sides and top of a 4 - 9 inch layer cake."
ins: Beat the butter until it has the appearance of thick cream, stir in confectioners sugar, a little at a time, and continue working until mixture is very smooth.  Beat in egg yolk and lemon juice.  Stir in enough orange juice to make a spreadable frosting, then add grated rind of 1 lemon and 2 grated orange rinds.  Spread on sides and top of cake.
